title: Learn React.js in 2025
metaDesc: A modern guide to learning React.js in 2025 with components, hooks, and best practices.
content:
React is a component-based JavaScript library used to build modern, fast, and interactive user interfaces.

Core Concepts

  • JSX – Writing HTML inside JavaScript.
  • Components – Reusable building blocks of UI.
  • Hooks – Special functions like useState and useEffect.

Example Component

import { useState } from 'react'; function Counter() { const [count, setCount] = useState(0); return ( 
 
Count: {count}
  
 ); }
“The future of web is component-driven.”
